Sentencas: A two-dimensional model is developed to simulate the performance of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) fed with CO2 and CH4 mixture.
Titulo: Modeling and parametric simulations of solid oxide fuel cells with methane carbon dioxide reforming

Sentencas: The electrochemical oxidations of both CO and H-2 are included.
Titulo: Modeling and parametric simulations of solid oxide fuel cells with methane carbon dioxide reforming

Sentencas: Important chemical reactions are considered in the model, including methane carbon dioxide reforming (MCDR), reversible water gas shift reaction (WGSR), and methane steam reforming (MSR).
Titulo: Modeling and parametric simulations of solid oxide fuel cells with methane carbon dioxide reforming

Sentencas: It's found that at a CH4/CO2 molar ratio of 50/50, MCDR and reversible WGSR significantly influence the cell performance while MSR is negligibly small.
Titulo: Modeling and parametric simulations of solid oxide fuel cells with methane carbon dioxide reforming

Sentencas: The performance of SOFC fed with CO2/CH4 mixture is comparable to SOFC running on CH4/H2O mixtures.
Titulo: Modeling and parametric simulations of solid oxide fuel cells with methane carbon dioxide reforming

Sentencas: The electric output of SOFC can be enhanced by operating the cell at a low operating potential or at a high temperature.
Titulo: Modeling and parametric simulations of solid oxide fuel cells with methane carbon dioxide reforming

Sentencas: In addition, the development of anode catalyst with high activity towards CO electrochemical oxidation is important for SOFC performance enhancement.
Titulo: Modeling and parametric simulations of solid oxide fuel cells with methane carbon dioxide reforming

Sentencas: The model can serve as a useful tool for optimization of the SOFC system running on CH4/CO2 mixtures.
Titulo: Modeling and parametric simulations of solid oxide fuel cells with methane carbon dioxide reforming
